events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position, highlighting experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The recruitment team reviewed the application and classified it under the Engineering cluster due to the candidate's strong developer background.
A dedicated recruiter was assigned to this applicant to guide them through the interview process and coordinate subsequent steps.
The recruiter conducted an initial phone screening to evaluate the candidate's technical skills and motivation for this software engineer role.
The candidate responded promptly with enthusiasm, confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview and asked relevant questions about the tech stack.
The technical interview was scheduled for the following week, allowing adequate preparation time for the candidate to demonstrate coding and system design capabilities.
